text: Hi there! Another newbie question. Is there an easy way to embed pop-up-forms in external sites (standard forms can be embedded but haven´t found a way yet to do it for pop-up-forms as well)? Thank you in advance :slightly_smiling_face:
I believe you can do it as long as the external site loads the HubSpot tracking code <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/pop-up-forms/create-pop-up-forms>
Presumably you’d use URL matching criteria that targets the external site instead of one of your HubSpot domains
